name: Stock Movement Report 2
query:
select a.item_name as "Artikel::150",a.bulan as "Bulan::80",a.warehouse as "Warehouse::120",a.produksi_spk as "Produksi SPK:Float:150",b.produksi_masuk as "Produksi Masuk:float:150",d.material_receipt as "Material Receipt:Float:150",a.produksi_spk-NVL(d.material_receipt,0)-NVL(b.produksi_masuk,0) as "Selisih SPK:Float:120",NVL(e.material_konter,0) as "Konter:Float:120",NVL(c.sales,0) as "Sales:Float:120",NVL(b.produksi_masuk,0)+NVL(d.material_receipt,0)-NVL(c.sales,0) as "Sisa:Float:120" from (
select mwo.item_name,mwo.bulan,mwo.warehouse,sum(mwo.produksi_spk) as produksi_spk from (
select b.art_no "item_name",concat(month(a.spk_date),'-',year(a.spk_date)) as "bulan",a.fg_warehouse as "warehouse",
b.qty as "produksi_spk" from `tabMain Work Order` a inner join `tabWork Order Item Details` b on a.name = b.parent 
    where ((a.fg_warehouse='Finish Good Before BIN - ISS') or (substring(a.fg_warehouse,1,3) = '901'))) mwo group by mwo.item_name,mwo.bulan,mwo.warehouse) 
	a left join 
	(select pm.item_name,pm.bulan,pm.warehouse,sum(pm.produksi_masuk) as produksi_masuk from (
    select sed.item_name,sed.qty as "produksi_masuk",sed.t_warehouse as "warehouse",concat(month(se.posting_date),'-',year(se.posting_date)) 
	as "bulan" from `tabStock Entry Detail` sed inner join `tabStock Entry` se on sed.parent = se.name where 
	((sed.t_warehouse = 'Finish Good Before BIN - ISS') or (substring(sed.t_warehouse,1,3) = '901')) and se.purpose='Manufacture') pm group by pm.item_name,
    pm.bulan,pm.warehouse) b on a.item_name = b.item_name and a.bulan = b.bulan left join (select mr.item_name,mr.bulan,mr.warehouse,sum(mr.material_receipt) as material_receipt from (
select sed.item_name,sed.qty as "material_receipt",sed.t_warehouse as "warehouse",concat(month(se.posting_date),'-',year(se.posting_date)) as "bulan" from `tabStock Entry Detail` sed 
inner join `tabStock Entry` se on sed.parent = se.name where (substring(sed.t_warehouse,1,3) = '901')
and se.purpose='Material Receipt') mr group by mr.item_name,mr.bulan,mr.warehouse)d on a.item_name = d.item_name and a.bulan = d.bulan
    left join (select so.item_name,so.bulan,sum(so.sales) as "sales" from (
    select item_name,concat(month(delivery_date),'-',year(delivery_date)) as "bulan",delivered_qty as "sales" from `tabSales Order Item` 
    where parenttype = 'Sales Order') so group by so.item_name,so.bulan) c on a.item_name = c.item_name and a.bulan = c.bulan 
    left join (select store.item_name,store.bulan,store.warehouse,sum(store.material_konter) as material_konter from (
select sed.item_name,sed.qty as "material_konter",sed.t_warehouse as "warehouse",concat(month(se.posting_date),'-',year(se.posting_date)) as "bulan" from `tabStock Entry Detail` sed 
inner join `tabStock Entry` se on sed.parent = se.name where (substring(sed.t_warehouse,1,3) = 'MDS')
and se.purpose='Material Receipt') store group by store.item_name,store.bulan,store.warehouse) e on a.item_name = e.item_name and a.bulan = e.bulan
    order by a.bulan desc;
